text: Always remember that you're unique, just like everyone else.
The road to success is always under construction.
If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
Work until your bank account looks like a phone number. Preferably one that doesn't start with zero.
Follow your heart, but take your brain with you. It’s easy to get lost without it.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. And statistically, a bunch of the ones you do.
A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure. So, if you’re not a diamond yet, congratulations on being a future diamond.
They say good things come to those who wait. They forgot to mention that it’s the stuff left by those who got there first.
If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of payments.
Remember, if plan A fails, there are 25 more letters in the alphabet.
Age is of no importance unless you’re a cheese or a wine. The older, the better.
Money can't buy happiness, but it's much more comfortable to cry in a Mercedes than on a bicycle.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
If procrastination was an Olympic sport, you'd have a solid shot at a medal.
I asked God for a bike, but I know God doesn't work that way. So I stole a bike and asked for forgiveness.
People say nothing is impossible, but you do nothing every day.
I'd agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong.
Be like a duck, calm on the surface but always paddling like the dickens underneath. Just don’t quack under pressure.
It's okay if you don't like me. Not everyone has good taste.
Exercise? You thought I said extra fries.
